description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bring your friends over and conquer the world from your couch! A party style strategy game that mixes turned based and realtime mechanics, which I call semi-RTS. Co-optional 2-4p local multiplayer. There is an endless amount of random generated worlds to bring down. A small light wargame is included, in both single player and local versus.
description.short: Bring your friends over and conquer the world from your couch! A party style strategy game that mixes turned based and realtime mechanics, which I call semi-RTS. Co-optional 2-4p local multiplayer. There is an endless amount of random generated worlds to bring down. A small light wargame is included, in both single player and local versus.
